panels.description: Total usable space in bytes, not including WAFL reserve and aggregate Snapshot copy reserve.
panels.title: Total Space

panels.description: Space used or reserved in bytes. Includes volume guarantees and aggregate metadata.
panels.title: Used and Reserved Space

panels.description: Average latency for all operations in the system.

targets.expr:
sum(node_total_latency{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"}) by (node)
and
topk(
  $TopResources,
  sum by (node) (
    avg_over_time(node_total_latency{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", node!=""}[3h])
  )
)

panels.title: Top $TopResources Nodes by Latency

panels.description: Total number of operations per second.

targets.expr:
sum(node_total_ops{datacenter=~"$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster"}) by (node)
and
topk(
  $TopResources,
  sum by (node) (
    avg_over_time(node_total_ops{datacenter=~"$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster", node!=""}[3h])
  )
)

panels.title: Top $TopResources Nodes by IOPs

current.text: System CPU resource utilization is a computed percentage that indicates how busy the system is based on a combination of the most heavily utilized domain and idle CPU cycles. This metric determines the amount of available CPU and will vary based on domains reaching their limits OR exhausting all idle CPU cycles, whichever comes first.
